author: rhuijben
msg: * STATUS: Nominate r1553376 group for backporting.

author: rhuijben
msg: (add_directory): Following up on r1553376, apply the same fix to directories.

author: stefan2
msg: The file context created in add_file() is supposed to survive beyond the
end of function, so it needs its own copy of copy_path.
The failure scenario was observed in git-svn usage, with errors like
(add_file): All members of the new_file struct shall have
the same lifetime as the struct itself.

author: metskem
msg: fixed some javadoc warnings. Regenerated and uploaded latest javadoc to http://people.apache.org/~metskem/JSPWiki/javadoc

author: rhuijben
msg: Following up on r1553367, extend testcase to show that proplist is
still broken for DAV even though a single propget for a revision property
